name: Rejection
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create an intense field that fills a 10 foot radius around you. Attacks and spells of equal or lower tier fail to penetrate the field. Creatures that try to pass the field must make an Intuition saving throw. On a failure, they are instead stunned until the start of your next turn and knocked backwards 5 feet.

Your movement speed is halved for the duration of the spell.
